original: Borgström, Carl-Gustaf, polissekreterare, Göteborg, f. 13/10/10 i Hälsingborg av bankkamr. G. B. o. Helena Andersson. G. 41 m. Ulla-Lisa Sund-qvist. Barn: Carl Peter Gusitaf f. 47. — Stud:ex. i Hälsingborg 29, jur. kand. i Lund 36, polischefskurs 46. Res. i ett flert. europ. länder 31-39. Not. i doms. 36, omb :man i PhiHpsons Bil A-B 39, statspolisassist. 39-41, polisassessor i Gbg 41-46, polissekr. i Gbg sed. 46. Krigsfiskal sed. 43, lär. v. po- Hssk. i Gbg sed. 42. Skr.: ett 50-tal art., utredn. o. rec. i fackpressen 41-47, medl. av red. f. Landsstaten sed. 45.
translated: Borgström, Carl-Gustaf, police secretary, Gothenburg, b. 13/10/10 in Helsingborg to bank clerk G.B. and Helena Andersson. Married in 1941 to Ulla-Lisa Sundqvist, with son Carl Peter Gustaf born in 1947. He graduated from high school in Helsingborg in 1929 and received a law degree from Lund University in 1936. He completed a police chief course in 1946 and traveled to multiple European countries from 1931-1939. He was a notary in 1936, a representative for PhiHpsons Bil A-B in 1939, a state police assistant from 1939-1941, a police assessor in Gothenburg from 1941-1946, and a police secretary in Gothenburg after 1946. He was a war fiscal officer from 1943 and teacher at the police school in Gothenburg from 1942. He wrote about 50 articles, reports, and reviews on professional journals from 1941-1947 and was a member of the editorial board for Landsstaten after 1945.
